activities: MessageOne, Inc.  is a provider of computer software and related professional services. MessageOne, Inc. may receive personal data from itself as well as from its affiliates and other parties located in Switzerland. Such information may be about customers, business partners, consultants, employees, and candidates for employment and includes information recorded on various media as well as electronic data.
personaldata: Personal Information in electronic and hard copy formats.
recoursemech: For human resources data: Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).  For all other types of data: BBB EU Safe Harbor http://www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.
